metadata.title: CVE-2022-31606 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows contains a vulnerability in thekernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys) handler for DxgkDdiEscape, where a failureto properly validate data might allow an attacker with basic usercapabilities to cause an out-of-bounds access in kernel mode, which couldlead to denial of service, information disclosure, escalation ofprivileges, or data tampering.
